input.sentences: fran went to the club in hope of making new friends .
the night turned into a blur of fun and excitement .
a lot of singing occurred and it was not that bad .
a shirtless male made his way to the dance floor .
fran made friends with a boy name [male] who took her back to his apartment .
output.sentences: The girls were nervous to perform at first.
Once they got into it, and the crowd was hollering in enjoyment, things got a bit hazy.
At one point, a fan hopped up onto the stage and joined them.
Things got crazy after that; what a night.
